name: Flea-B-Gon
description:
A game made in 3 hours for TriJam #122

NARRATOR

Summer's here, and you know what that means. Lots of walks, trips to the dog park, and-

NARRATOR

-little, creepy crawly things. (shudders) But with Flea-B-Gon and its patented two-in-one formula, you can get rid of both fleas and ticks with one simple-to-use spray.

NARRATOR

Spray it to kill and get rid of their eggs, or use it up to 24 hours in advance to prevent them from landing in the first place

NARRATOR

You said it, buddy. Pick up some Flea-B-Gon at your local supermarket today and start enjoying summer today.
